urls.title: European Test Finder
urls.description: We are developing a brand new European Test Finder! The European Test Finder is an easy way to search for the nearest place to get tested for HIV, Hepatitis B, Hepatitis C and other STIs in all countries of the wider Europea n region. Please start by selecting the country you are in from the drop-down menu below. Then write your city and tick the relevant boxes for what you would like to get tested for (you can choose several options at the same time). Then simply press the Search button to see your

In the EU/EEA, it takes a person about three years from the time of #HIV infection until they are diagnosed.

Testing is vital to #KnowYourStatus.
